actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To establish a National Panel on Early Reading Research and Effective Reading Instruction.
short_title: Successful Reading Research and Instruction Act

summary.text: Successful Reading Research and Instruction Act - Directs the Secretary of Education and the Director of the National Institute of Child Health and Human Development to: (1) establish a National Panel on Early Reading Research and Effective Reading Instruction; and (2) report to the Congress on the panel's findings and recommendations.

titles.title: Successful Reading Research and Instruction Act
To establish a National Panel on Early Reading Research and Effective Reading Instruction.
